com.launchdarkly.testhelpers.httptest

Class SimpleRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.launchdarkly.testhelpers.httptest.SimpleRouter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler

    public final class SimpleRouter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Handler
    A delegator that provides simple request path/method matching.

    The request is sent to the handler for the first matching path. If there is no matching path, it returns a 404. If there is a matching path but only for a different HTTP method, it returns a 405.

      • addRegex

        public SimpleRouter addRegex(java.util.regex.Pattern regex,
                             Handler handler)
        Adds a regex path pattern.

        The regex must match the entire path. If it contains any capture groups, the matched groups will be available from RequestContext.getPathParam(int).

        Parameters:
        regex - the regex to match
        handler - the handler to call for a matching request
        Returns:
        the same instance

      • addRegex

        public SimpleRouter addRegex(java.lang.String method,
                             java.util.regex.Pattern regex,
                             Handler handler)
        Adds a regex path pattern, speifying the HTTP method.

        The regex must match the entire path. If it contains any capture groups, the matched groups will be available from RequestContext.getPathParam(int).

        Parameters:
        method - the desired method
        regex - the regex to match
        handler - the handler to call for a matching request
        Returns:
        the same instance
